I have heretrix-1.10.2 running on a dual core Linux box with 2.8Ghz
cpu's a=
nd 8G memory. Heretrix is often running into an Out of Memory
error. I dont=
 recall seeing this error with an older version of
heretrix v1.8 that I had=
 running for quite sometime.

I am running it on a 64 bit machine. And the =
version of java I am
using is j2se_jdk_sun-1.5.0.07. I have the heap size s=
et to 3Gigs
(-Xmx option.). Does anyone have any ideas on how to resolve th=
is?
Should I try running it with a 64 bit JVM, so I can specify a larger
he=
ap?
